entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:25 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 09:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -29.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
